section.name: current-release
section.title: Current release
section.p:
The current release is :
SimpleTest v1.0.1.

You can download this version from
SourceForget.net and your local mirror. You may also want to look at the current changelog.

section.name: eclipse-release
section.title: Eclipse release
section.p: If eclipse is your IDE / editor of choice, you might consider the Eclipse plugin.
For automatic "find and install", the URL is : http://simpletest.org/eclipse/

section.name: packages
section.title: Packages
section.p: SimpleTest has been packaged by the community to different flavours.

p.cite: Note : careful, some versions are not always up-to-date.

section.name: source
section.title: Source
section.p: The source code is hosted on Sourceforge as well : you can browse the SVN repository there.
